= Introduction =
 
The CogbotEvent class (formerly SimObjectEvent)

Events in general are:

# Simulator Packet  "parent id changed"
# LibOMV Event  "on sit changed"
# Cogbot Salient Event "Joe sat down"
# MethodInvoke "Please Make Beep"
# GUI Event "Use maximized App" 
# Command Sent  "@joe standup"
# Command Result Received "you are not joe!"
# Module Raised Event "user is has typed (sending commands)"
